text: Heidi is a 1937 musical-drama movie. It is about a Swiss orphan girl named Heidi, who is sent from her home in the Swiss Alps to Frankfurt, Germany, to live with Klara, an isolated wealthy girl in a wheelchair, under the watch of the strict housekeeper Fr√§ulein Rottenmeier. Shirley Temple plays the title character. This movie was released on October 15, 1937. == Other websites == * * * * Category:1937 drama movies Category:1930s American musical movies Category:1930s American drama movies Category:Movies directed by Allan Dwan Category:20th Century Fox movies Category:Movies set in Switzerland Category:Movies set in Germany
title: Heidi (movie)
